alert.note: Alert for Appling; Bacon; Coffee; Jeff Davis; Pierce; Wayne (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued December 18 at 2:00PM EST until December 19 at 8:00AM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM TO 8 AM EST TUESDAY... ...FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY EVENING THROUGH WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 31 expected. For the Freeze Watch, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 29 possible. * WHERE...Coffee, Jeff Davis, Bacon, Appling, Wayne and Pierce Counties. * WHEN...For the Freeze Warning, from 5 AM to 8 AM EST Tuesday. For the Freeze Watch, from Tuesday evening through Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops and other sensitive vegetation.
info.instruction: Appropriate action should be taken to ensure tender vegetation and outdoor pets have adequate protection from the cold temperatures. Young children, the elderly and the homeless are especially vulnerable to the cold. Take measures to protect them.

area.areaDesc: Appling; Bacon; Coffee; Jeff Davis; Pierce; Wayne
